name: freethings
description: A monorepo of free online tools and utilities - QR code generator, unit converter, text tools, and more

scripts.test: echo 'Visit http://localhost:8000 to test the site'
scripts.check: node -e "console.log('Checking project structure...'); const fs = require('fs'); const tools = ['frontpage', 'qrcode-site', 'unit-converter', 'text-case-converter', 'password-generator', 'uuid-generator', 'base64-converter', 'word-counter', 'image-converter', 'image-resizer']; let missing = 0; tools.forEach(tool => { if (!fs.existsSync(tool + '/index.html')) { console.log('✗ ' + tool + '/index.html missing'); missing++; } else { console.log('✓ ' + tool + '/index.html'); } }); if (missing === 0) { console.log('All files present!'); } else { console.log(missing + ' files missing'); }"
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for static site'

author: FreeThings.win
